entries.name: new(dependency, requester)
entries.desc: Creates a new DependencyRequest for dependency from requester. +requester may be nil if the request came from a user.

entries.name: development?()
entries.desc: Is this dependency a development dependency?

entries.name: explicit?()
entries.desc: Indicate that the request is for a gem explicitly requested by the user

entries.name: implicit?()
entries.desc: Indicate that the request is for a gem requested as a dependency of another gem

entries.name: match?(spec, allow_prerelease = false)
entries.desc: Does this dependency request match spec?

entries.name: matches_spec?(spec)
entries.desc: Does this dependency request match spec?

entries.name: name()
entries.desc: The name of the gem this dependency request is requesting.

entries.name: request_context()
entries.desc: Return a String indicating who caused this request to be added (only valid for implicit requests)

entries.name: requirement()
entries.desc: The version requirement for this dependency request
